thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Lauren

author: Lauren
title: Lauren
text: Travelling with intrepid was amazing, our guide Abhi was incredible, a wealth of knowledge and patience, an absolute asset to Intrepid!! For a solo female traveller this tour was perfect, I felt safe 24/7, we travelled to so many jaw dropping locations that I just don't think I could get to on my own, every night we went for dinner and each restaurant was more amazing then the one before! I would highly recommend the Rajasthan Experience comfort tour and I cannot wait to travel with intrepid again!!
